content: To use HeroUI with Vite, you need Vite 2+, React 18+, Tailwind CSS v4, and Framer Motion 11.9+.
The recommended way to start a new Vite project is by using the HeroUI CLI (`pnpm create @heroui`) or the official HeroUI + Vite template (`pnpm create vite@latest --template heroui`).
For an existing Vite project, you can use the CLI to add components (`pnpm dlx @heroui/cli add <component>`) or perform a manual installation by adding dependencies and configuring Tailwind CSS.

After manual installation in a Vite project, you must set up the `HeroUIProvider` at the root of your application. This is typically done in `src/main.jsx` or `src/main.tsx` by wrapping your `<App />` component.
